Packages

  • formit
    • FormIt
      Base class for FormIt. Used for initializing the form processing engine, handling templating and running snippets.
    • fiDictionary
      Abstracts storage of values of posted fields and fields set by hooks.
    • fiHooks
      Base Hooks handling class. Hooks can be used to run scripts prior to loading the form, or after a form has been submitted.
    • fiRequest
      Handles all pre and POST requests for FormIt and abstracts hooks and validation processing.
    • fiValidator
      Handles custom validation on fields. Allows for specific, defined validators by FormIt, or custom Validators that are MODX Snippets.

Files

    • fiDictionary
      Abstracts storage of values of posted fields and fields set by hooks.

    • fiHooks
      Base Hooks handling class. Hooks can be used to run scripts prior to loading the form, or after a form has been submitted.

      Handles all pre and POST requests for FormIt and abstracts hooks and validation processing.
  • fivalidator.class.php
    • fiValidator
      Handles custom validation on fields. Allows for specific, defined validators by FormIt, or custom Validators that are MODX Snippets.

      Base class for FormIt. Used for initializing the form processing engine, handling templating and running snippets.
